subject: JUnit ANT Target
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am able to execute a test through normal javac and java from ANT. However when I use the JUnit ANT target to invoke the same tests the test fails. It
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am able to execute a test through normal javac and java from ANT. However
when I use the JUnit ANT target to invoke the same tests the test fails.

It does not show any information as well as to what is the cause of the
failure. I have set the showoutput to true, printSummary to true and fork to
true.

The stack trace that I observe is something like this ....

The ' characters around the executable and arguments are
not part of the command.
[junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

BUILD FAILED
F:\oblix\owsm11g\ccorehome\tests\unittest\buildtests.xml:114: Test
com.oracle.JU
nitAll failed
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask.actOnTestResul
t(JUnitTask.java:1468)

(JUnitT
ask.java:691)

(JUnitT
ask.java:632)
at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.execute(UnknownElement.java
:275)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Task.perform(Task.java:364)

at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.performTasks(Target.java:369)

(DefaultExe
cutor.java:40)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:1068)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:668)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.startAnt(Main.java:187)
at org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher.run(Launcher.java:246)
at org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:67)

Total time: 3 seconds
F:\oblix\owsm11g\ccorehome\tests\unittest>
